ARABIC: قَالَ هَلْ عَلِمْتُم مَّا فَعَلْتُم بِيُوسُفَ وَأَخِيهِ إِذْ أَنتُمْ جَٰهِلُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'Are you aware of what you did to Yusuf and his brother in ignorance?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: , He said: "Do you know what you did to Joseph and his brother in your ignorance?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When Joseph heard this (he could not hold himself and said): "Do you remember what you did to Joseph and his brother when you were ignorant?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Joseph asked them, "Do you know what you did to Joseph and his brother in your ignorance?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “Are you aware of what you did to Yusuf and his brother when you were unwise?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: He said: "Do you know what you did with Yusuf and his brother, when you were ignorant"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: Do you know how you treated Yusuf and his brother when you were ignorant?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: He said, 'Are you aware of what you did with Joseph and his brother, when you were ignorant?'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: Know ye what ye did unto Joseph and his brother in your ignorance?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "Are you aware of what you did to Joseph and his brother in ignorance?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: remember ye that which ye did Unto Yusuf and his brother while ye were ignorant?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘Have you realized what you did to Joseph and his brother, when you were senseless?’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "Know ye how ye dealt with Joseph and his brother, not knowing (what ye were doing)?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: He said: "Do you know what you did with Yusuf (Joseph) and his brother, when you were ignorant?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Do you know' he replied, 'what you did to Joseph and his brother in your ignorance'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “Do you realize what you did with Joseph and his brother, in your ignorance?”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: He said, "Do you know what you did with Joseph and his brother when you were ignorant?"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:89] Then, he said, to them, in rebuke: ‘Do you realise what you did to Joseph, in the way of beating [him] and selling [him] and otherwise, and his brother, oppressing him, after having separated him from his brother, while you were ignorant?’, of where the affair of Joseph will lead?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said) Joseph said to them: (Know ye what ye did unto Joseph and his brother in your ignorance) when you were ignorant youth?
